reviews.review: A beautiful game, but the community is full of toxicity and cheaters even on Prime
Is gewoon terug de max om te spelen, en veel mooier geworden.

The game that has one of the most toxic communities in the world and only is focused on making players buy shitty skins for extreme prices. It used to be a game that was at least bearable until the Danger Zone update. Since then, its unplayable.
